details.name: Bandorban-Keokradong
details.description: Mount Keokradong (1230 Merers) is located in the Ruma thana of Bandarban district. It is roughly a day of walk from Boga lake.Keokradong is a peak located in Bandarban, Bangladesh, with an elevation of 986 metres

details.name: Tanguar Haor
details.description: Tanguar Haor is a river basin which is located at the Tahirpur Upazila of Sunamgonj district in Sylhet Division.Tanguar haor located in the Dharmapasha and Tahirpur upazilas of Sunamganj District in Bangladesh

details.name: Sat Gambuj Mosque
details.description: The mosque is locally known as the 'Shat Gombuj Masjid', which in Bengali means Sixty Domed Mosque.

details.name: Sundarbans
details.description: Sundarbans is a mangrove area in the delta formed by the confluence of the Ganges, Brahmaputra and Meghna Rivers in the Bay of Bengal.

details.name: Ali-kadam
details.description: Alikadam is a popular hiking destination among tourists for the tunnels in the mountains known as Alir Guha or Ali's Tunnels. Tourists are expected to face slippery and muddy terrains for the hike to the tunnels.

details.name: Cox's Bazar
details.description: Cox's Bazar is a city, fishing port, tourism centre, and district headquarters in southeastern Bangladesh.

details.name: St. Martin's Island
details.description: St. Martin is generally known as “Narikel Zinzira” in Bengali, means 'Coconut Island' and this is the only coral reef island in Bangladesh.
